p.sub: Answering these questions while actively reading the text is good practice for answering the kinds of questions that might appear on the exams. Your answers may also shape the discussions in class.

open_response.prompt: Question: If cytoplasmic mRNA from a eukaryote were allowed to form a hydrogen-bonded RNA-DNA hybrid structure with the melted chromosome from the same organism, would it be possible to identify the introns? On which strand would you expect to see loops of single stranded nucleotides?
